About.title: About Me
About.introductionText: I'm a FullStack developer passionate about turning ideas into amazing digital solutions. With experience working directly withclients, I have a solid understanding of their needs and expectations, and I'm committed to delivering results that exceed their expectations.

Contact.title: Contact me
Contact.sucessText: Thank you for contacting me. I will respond as soon as possible.
Contact.errorText: Sorry, an error occurred while sending your message. Please try again later.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.emptyDescription: This is an amazing project that will be available soon. Stay tuned to discover a variety of exciting news and features!
